title: Powerful Storm Slams Northeast; Half-Million Without Power in Region
text:
Hundreds of thousands of people in the Northeast were without power Thursday after a powerful storm brought strong winds and heavy rain to the region overnight.

The nor’easter intensified into an unusually powerful storm for this early in the season as it poured through New England late Wednesday and into Thursday. By early Thursday, about half a million customers in northeastern states including Massachusetts, Maine, New Hampshire and Connecticut were without power, according to estimates from utility companies.

...
description: Hundreds of thousands of people in the Northeast were without power after a powerful storm brought strong winds and heavy rain to the region overnight.
